org.apache.ambari.server.topology

Class HostGroupInfo

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.ambari.server.topology.HostGroupInfo

  • public class HostGroupInfo
extends Object
    Host Group information specific to a cluster instance.

    • Method Detail

      • getHostGroupName

        public String getHostGroupName()
        Get the host group name.
        Returns:
        host group name

      • getHostNames

        public Collection<String> getHostNames()
        Get the collection of user specified host names for the host group. If the user specified a count instead of host names then an empty collection is returned.
        Returns:
        collection of user specified host names; will never be null

      • getRequestedHostCount

        public int getRequestedHostCount()
        Get the requested host count. This is either the user specified value or the number of explicitly specified host names specified by the user.
        Returns:
        number of requested hosts for the group

      • addHost

        public void addHost(String hostName)
        Associate a single host name to the host group.
        Parameters:
        hostName - the host name to associate with the host group

      • addHosts

        public void addHosts(Collection<String> hosts)
        Associate multiple host names to the host group.
        Parameters:
        hosts - collection of host names to associate with the host group

      • setRequestedCount

        public void setRequestedCount(int num)
        Set the requested host count for the host group.
        Parameters:
        num - requested host count

      • setConfiguration

        public void setConfiguration(Configuration configuration)
        Set host group configuration for the host group.
        Parameters:
        configuration - configuration instance

      • getConfiguration

        public Configuration getConfiguration()
        Get the host group configuration associated with the host group.
        Returns:
        associated host group scoped configuration or null if no configuration is specified for the host group

      • setPredicate

        public void setPredicate(String predicateString)
                  throws InvalidQueryException
        Set the host predicate for the host group.
        Parameters:
        predicateString - host predicate as a string
        Throws:
        InvalidQueryException - if compilation of the predicate fails

      • getPredicate

        public Predicate getPredicate()
        Get the compiled host predicate for the host group.
        Returns:
        the compiled host predicate or null if no predicate was specified

      • getPredicateString

        public String getPredicateString()
        Get the host predicate string for the host group.
        Returns:
        the host predicate string or null if no predicate was specified

      • addHostRackInfo

        public void addHostRackInfo(String host,
                            String rackInfo)
        Registers host rack information.
        Parameters:
        host - the name of the host
        rackInfo - the rack information

      • getHostRackInfo

        public Map<String,String> getHostRackInfo()
        Returns a map with host names mapped to rack information.
        Returns:
        a copy of the current instance' rack information map

        public void removeHost(String hostname)
        Removes hostname from group
        Parameters:
